page.title: 12 LIGHT WATER AMUSEMENTS
page.content: Once you have paid the entrance fee all the rides in the amusement park are free.You can have as many goes as you like and on some of the rides you can have as long as you like on the rides. The attractions include the hellslide,fort,gocarts,merry-go-round swing boats,paddling boats,rowing boats,buggies,moterbikes,steamtrain, magic mirrors,archery,roller-booting, skateboards,dark slide, broncobikes, tractor,trailer,baby-slide, trampolines, musical boats,electric cars,and electric trains,sand pit,golf course,pony and donkey rides,flying turtles,carousel,spiders web,flying chairs,and flying boats. Our Favourite ride is the hell slide. {Nicola Hinchliffe Sacha Wass Jennifer} {Ward.}
